description: Replace simple keyword-based file discovery with intelligent CodeRef-powered context discovery using relationship graphs, pattern matching, and semantic scoring
goal: Enable graph-based, relationship-aware context discovery instead of simple keyword matching to provide more relevant file suggestions during stub planning
requirements: Integrate CodeRef MCP tools (coderef_scan, coderef_patterns, coderef_context, coderef_query) into context discovery API route
Implement semantic scoring system (pattern similarity 40pts, dependencies 30pts, complexity 20pts, coverage 10pts)
Add new file categories: Components, Hooks, API Routes, Utils, Tests
Build calculateSemanticRelevance() function to replace keyword frequency scoring
Update UI to display new file categories
out_of_scope: Changes to other session workflow components
constraints: Must maintain compatibility with existing session creation workflow
Keep current API route interface for backward compatibility
No breaking changes to UI components
